Detailed Description

Cables link a pair of particles, generating a contact if they stray too far apart.

Member Function Documentation

◆ addContact()

unsigned ParticleCable::addContact ( ParticleContact *  contact,
unsigned  limit 
) const
virtual

Fills the given contact structure with the contact needed to keep the cable from over-extending.

Implements cyclone::ParticleLink.
